Header: Report on damages caused to cultivations is being compiled
Content: Agriculture Minister Mahinda Amaraweera has given instructions to officials to forward a report containing information on damages caused to cultivations as a result of adverse weather conditions. Crops including vegetables in several areas of the island have been damaged following the extreme weather conditions. The Agriculture Ministry said this was the cause for the rise in the price of vegetables. The Minister revealed of his intention to submit a proposal to the Government for the granting of relief on behalf of the damaged cultivations.
